Dev Emoji keyboard.

Add emoji's without taking your hands off of the keyboard.

Invoke the emoji keyboard by pressing colon(:). It works on Input, Textarea & contenteditable elements.

Works on:
- Twitter/X
- Reddit
- Gmail
- Hey mail
- Many more...

Doesn't work on
- Bluesky
